Portal 2 has such an amazing graphical and mechanical jump than the first game, it's really incredible.

If you have the first Portal, and you really liked it, don't think twice before buying this game. It has the same charisma and enjoyment of Portal 1, but thrown to the extreme. It's unfair to compare P1 with P2 due to the big time frame between them, but P2 just makes P1 look like a demo.
Not saying that Portal 1 is bad, I still love that game a lot, but you get the idea.
P2 is way longer, so maybe if your idea is to finish the game quickly, than maybe P1 is better for you.
Portal 2 not only has a way better campaign, mechanics and graphics, but it also has multiplayer, a level editor and support to the Steam Workshop so you can publish your levels or play custom levels made by the community.

If you never played Portal 1 before and you’re looking for the best experience, I would recommend you to play it in order, so the first one first, and then the second. Knowing Portal 1 really makes P2 a better experience. I had played P2 on my X-Box 360 before Portal 1, and let me just say, after buying P1 and then playing P2 again, it really makes some things make a lot of sense and brings in some new feelings of nostalgia and charisma. If you want to play Portal 2 before the first one, go ahead, but I wouldn't recommend that.

If you have played P2 before, be it on a console, or in a friend's house, and you’re not sure if it’s worth buying it and play it again, I can guarantee you that it is. I had the same question in the past, I had P2 on my X-Box 360 but wanted to see the PC experience. I bought it and did not regret it at all.
Let me just say, I have finished this game three to four times already, and the fun never drained out. Not only that, but the controls and the multiplayer on the PC feels a lot more fluid. The console version also lacks the level editor and Steam Workshop compatibility, which is a big part of the experience.
Levels can also be made with the hammer editor, which I have no clue how to use it at all, but some people do it, and their levels are amongst the best.

In general, another thing that makes this game stand out are the characters. GLaDOS is better than ever, Wheatley is a cute and funny little guy, Cave Johnson brings his serious attitude but playful substyle to his lines, and Chell is mute… Like always…
You can unfold secrets and make your own theories for this game, the plot really has many twists and interesting moments…

So yeah, of course, this is amongst my favorite games ever, and saying I “recommend” it is understating.

FANTASTIC. Obviously, I don't need to say that at this point in time, because this game is already fairly old. However, this game is just all-around great. For $2, which is Portal 2's price every time there is a sale, you are getting every single penny's worth. The campaign is clever, well-written, challenging, and extremely fun. The multiplayer campaign, which is especially good if you are playing with friends, keeps the hilarious and fun puzzling formula from the single player. After finishing both game modes, the community maps are fun to explore and create.

Increíblemente, Portal 2 es mejor que su predecesor. Continuamos con la historia de Chell, quién todavía está atrapada en las instalaciones de Aperture Science y vigilada por GLaDOS, sólo que esta vez la acompañará Wheatley, un núcleo de personalidad bastante simpático. Seguiremos usando la misma pistola de portales, solo que esta vez en salas más difíciles, con nuevas mecánicas como los distintos tipos de gel y descubriendo más a fondo la historia de las instalaciones y de GLaDOS, mas el modo cooperativo se hace muy entretenido jugarlo con alguien. Y con todo eso, puedo decir que es una obra maestra, 10/10

Portal 2 is an amazing continuation of it's predecessor Portal, and it tells so much more of the story. This game was (and is) incredibly fun, and a great experience to play. Portal 2 is by far the best game I have ever played, and I hope the the series will continue in some way. The cooperative chambers are also amazing, and there's a very cool extra story at the end of them. Overall, this game deserves a 100% and I don't think I'll ever find a game quite like this one.

Portal 2 

um jogo que era para ser um aperitivo entre os gigantes jogos da valve, mas que devido a sua jogabilidade inovadora e seus misterios sem solução que deixaram a comunidade louca, se tornou um grande jogo com uma continuação que deixou a todos os fans satisfeitos, apesar do jogo possuir um lado muito comico ele possue um lado muito sombrio por tras e tenho certeza que quem jogou sabe oque eu estou falando...

Pros do jogo:

--jogabilidade excelente

--historia muito criativa e que deixa o jogador querendo descobrir cada vez mais sobre este jogo e sua historia

--o jogo não é muito pesado e acho que roda em qualquer computador vendido em 2012 e sim por diante

--um plot twist muito bom e inesperado

Contras do jogo:

--legendas que somem do nada

--loadings muito demorados



Em resumo: Portal 2 é um jogo lindo e magnifico mas que possue os seus bugs e tem muitas pontas soltas nele

With love.

Message to Valve
The lack of communication between Valve and the Half-Life community has been a frustrating experience. While continued support for current and future products is greatly appreciated, fans of the Half-Life series have waited years for a word on when the franchise will return.

So, Instead of focusing efforts in a negative and disrespectful way, we have decided to gain Valve's attention by delivering a basic message:
  
Your oldest and longest running fanbase would like better communication.

Waiting patiently for over four years can be challenging as a fan, especially when E3 comes and goes without any sign of the Half-Life series and its continuation. Valve had stated that information was scheduled to be released towards the end of 2008, and we believe that if they have chosen to change those plans, fans should be acknowledged, regardless of developmental plans for the next Half-Life project. 

The entire trilogy of episodes was scheduled to be completed and released by 2007, and if Valve have decided to do other things for the time being, that is fine; all that we ask for is a basic response on the matter, and to let fans know whether or not the current story arc is scheduled to conclude at another point in time.
 
In addition: This message is in no way, shape or form attempting to rush the development of the Half-Life series; in fact, most members agree that Valve should take the time needed to deliver a complete and polished product.

If you agree with the above message and statements, please join this group and share your support constructively.

Hopefully such attention will be recognized by Valve, and the community's voice will be heard.
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/messagetovalve

Gefiel mir persönlich fast noch besser als Portal 1, da man es hier mit gleich zwei sehr speziellen KIs zu tun bekommt. Ich empfehle aber, den ersten Teil zuerst zu spielen, weil es quasi nahtlos weitergeht.
Die Rätsel sind wieder teils knifflig, teils jedoch (nach meinem Eindruck) auch etwas simpler gehalten als im Vorgänger. Trotzdem wurden viele neue Ideen mit eingebracht.
Das Spiel ist urkomisch, erfordert aber dennoch eine gewisse Anstrengung des Hirns - kauft es!

10시간을 사용했지만 아깝지않은 게임! 포탈1엔딩에서 받은 그 감동과 기쁨이 남아 포탈2까지 그 기대를 안고 플레이했던것같다.
포탈1보다는 어려운것같다. 확실히.하지만 그만큼의 알차고 구성좋은 스토리가유저들을 기다리고있다.포탈 시리즈를 구입하는분들에게는 포탈2전에는포탈 1을 먼저 클리어하고 오는게 좋다고 생각한다.그래야 부담이 덜 된다고 생각한다(개인적 의견).포탈을 이용해 풀어가는 게임, 머리를 많이 써야하기때문에퍼즐같이 풀어가는 게임을 좋아하시는 분이라면 강력추천한다! 포탈1에서의 그 엔딩과 이어지는 내용인만큼 엔딩에서의 로봇의 노래의 내용이 더더욱 감동을 불러오고, 뿌듯함이 10배는 늘어나는것같은 기분이 들었다포탈이라는 갓겜을 클리어했다는거에 감사하고, 포탈이라는 게임을 만들어준 제작진들과 그 회사에게 감사의 인사를 표하고 싶다.번외편으로 포탈3까지??(오바인가...//)나온다면야 이런 포탈 바로 돈주고 사서 플레이해야지 히히.

Знаете когда-то давно я проходил первые две части серии Portal на старом аккаунте который успешно потерял.Но прошло много лет я стал умнее и взрослее.Наткнувшись на новогоднюю скидку сразу же решил купить и удариться в ностальгию.Начал перепроходить.......снова посмеялся над шутками GLaDOS,порешал загадки и понял,что эта игра офигенна!Пока я прошел только сюжет впереди еще тонна увлекательного геймплея.
Дорогой друг,если ты действительно хочешь окунутся в хорошую атмосферу,порешть загадки(некоторые из них даже заставят изрядно попотеть) СПОЙЛЕР! [spoiler] Офигеть от предательства Уитли [/spoiler] и пройти действительно хорошие сюжеты(их два для одиночной и кооперативной игры с другом) пройти загадки от игроков и может создать свою,то мчись вперёд и пусть тебя не пугает что эта игра вышла аж в 2011!
